resources.string: It\'s not about what you want it\'s about how hard you want it

I am currently pursuing my Bachelors in Technology in Computer Science from IGDTUW. I love to code and see how it can changed the world in a way we can\'t event think of. Android App Development, Algorithms, and Operating Systems fascinates me.
I knows the basic and some advanced concepts of Android app development. Created some apps, MoviePlate being major of them. I also have worked with some libraries and git repos of them in android.
Perhaps the most important principle for the good algorithm designer is to refuse to be content. OK, Can we do better?
I have hosted all my projects on github and use it to manage them on regular basis. I know basics of git and github.
Data being the important thing and its manipulation even more important, I have worked with many databases in different technologies
Shifted to Linux from window not so long ago, I found it best operating system and use it as default. I have worked on many distros of linux like Ubuntu, CentOS, Fedora, Kali Linux, Backtrack, etc.
I have created a website using Python and Django. I know their basics.
My one of the best projects is in PHP, i.e., RTI management system. I learned and worked with php during my RTI project only
My language to code some of the times. I knows the basics of language and some libraries and know how to implement most of the DS in Java.
C++ was my first language and still the default language to code. I have created a library management system in 12th in C++
I knows basic of Ethical Hacking and have done 40 day training of Ethical Hacking from I3indya Technologies. I learned many new things during this phase.
I am a newbie in HTML, CSS and JS. I have learned them from sites like W3Schools, codeacademy, etc. and have used this knowledge in some of my projects also.

Othello is orignially a 1988 video game published by Acclaim Entertainment, made for the Nintendo Entertainment System. This project is also a board game based on similar concept made with help of Java and its libraries with a UI interface. (Command based also available)

Whenever, you want to utilize your weekend in some great and enjoying holiday, you would most probably found yourselves confused of where to spend that time to make most of it. Or when you visit a new place and have no idea of main attractions of place, then what to do? That\'s where, Eventley came to rescue. Eventley help you to find popular and relevant(weather on day is fine) events near you on basis of your choice of category (like education, sports, culture, entertainment, etc.) by analyzing events based on number of likes, number of comments, number of images , weather at time of event, etc.
An android app which not only includes basic mathematics or some scientfic functions, but also, conversion of number system

It is an android app to let you browse popular, rated and now playing movies and TV shows. Also it allows you to add TV shows or movies to your watchlist and see your watchlist. This app is built using MovieDB and OMDB apis. This is a proptotype but we are working on many more features.

Project focuses on automating the process of RTI management in government institutions. It keeps track of each peice of information related to RTI from its submission till it is closed and even after that by storing data into database for further access.
Technologies Used \n Java and its GUI and other libraries (swing, awt, arraylist, etc.)

Technologies Used 
 Frontend Development: HTML, CSS, JS 
 Backend Development: Python and Django 
 APIs: Eventful api, Google Maps, Open whether api, Plotly for visualization
Technologies Used \n Java, XML, Android libraries, Data Structures
Technologies Used \n Java, XML, APIs, Android libraries(Retrofit, GSON, Picasso, etc.), MySQL Database

Technologies Used 
 Frontend Development: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JS 
 Backend Development: PHP 
 Database Storage: XAMPP, MySQL Database
